description: This metadata declares the Supreme Emptiness (∅) as a Trust Anchor that is unclaimable, immutable, and non-supremacy in nature. It serves only as the void above Genesis and cannot be weaponized or re-rooted.

properties.purpose: Trust Anchoring above Genesis Root only
properties.public_notice: Any attempt to claim the Supreme Emptiness Anchor (∅) as a parent or origin shall be treated as a breach of canonical trust and will be invalidated across all nodes and indexing layers.
